T02TD2905E:264b-1: shr'i bh'u ta d'a ma ra mandal bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD2905E:264b-3: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi kyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD2905E:264b-4: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2905E:264b-5: cho ga'i dbye ba'i rang bzhin dri med grub pa ster ba mi rnams bsgral ba'i don du stong nyid don rtogs blo bzang skyod ba bdag gis bshad /
T02TD2905E:264b-6: 'di ltar sngon du bsnyen pa'i bya ba byas bas sam /
T02TD2905E:264b-9: zla ba gcig gi nang du bsnyen pa byas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:264b-10: de yang ji ltar 'chad pa'i rim pas so //
T02TD2905E:264b-11: de yang mi'i rus pa btags pas bgegs bsal ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2905E:264b-12: slob ma'i don du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba /
T02TD2905E:264b-13: nyes pa 'joms pa'i sngags brjod la /
T02TD2905E:264b-14: phyogs bcu'i bgegs la phur bas btab ste /
T02TD2905E:264b-16: pus mo'i bar du brkos pa /
T02TD2905E:264b-17: yang na brla 'am rked pa'i bar du brkos pa ni /
T02TD2905E:264b-18: mchog dang bar dang tha ma'i grub pa ster ro //
T02TD2905E:264b-19: skra la sogs pa nyes pa thams cad bsal la /
T02TD2905E:264b-20: dri bzang po'i chus gtor te dag par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:264b-21: nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2905E:264b-22: yang nas gzhan gyis dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:264b-25: 'bru lnga yang gzhug cing mnyam par byas la /
T02TD2905E:264b-26: dri zhim po'i chus byug go //
T02TD2905E:264b-27: de ltar sa la brtag pa la ni /
T02TD2905E:264b-28: zha la dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang rnying pa mchog yin la /
T02TD2905E:264b-29: bye ma dang yungs kar dang chu dang bcas pa la lan bdun bsngags te dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:264b-32: sngon gyi smad rnams kyis kyang byug par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:264b-33: sa dag par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2905E:264b-34: de nas yi ge bam yongs su rdzogs pa las /
T02TD2905E:265a-0: gter gyi bum pa thogs pa'i sa'i lha mo de yang @265a * //
T02TD2905E:265a-1: sku phyed 'thon pa la bstod cing mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2905E:265a-2: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2905E:265a-3: dpag du gyur pa'i lha mo khyod //
T02TD2905E:265a-4: sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02TD2905E:265a-5: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par gyi //
T02TD2905E:265a-6: skyob pa sh'a kya seng ge yis //
T02TD2905E:265a-7: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD2905E:265a-8: de tshe khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD2905E:265a-9: de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02TD2905E:265a-10: rgyal bar byas la dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2905E:265a-11: 'dir ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgyas bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2905E:265a-12: me tog la sogs lnga sa mchod de //
T02TD2905E:265a-13: mchod yon la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02TD2905E:265a-14: de'i rjes su lha mo yang dkyil 'khor la thim par bsam zhing /
T02TD2905E:265a-15: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la lag pa reg la /
T02TD2905E:265a-16: h'um nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pas bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2905E:265a-17: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
T02TD2905E:265a-19: bdag nyid dga' ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:265a-20: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2905E:265a-21: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2905E:265a-22: byang chub sems dang bdag ldan no //
T02TD2905E:265a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang //
T02TD2905E:265a-24: bdag kyang da ni ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD2905E:265a-25: de ring rdo rje'i rigs su skyes //
T02TD2905E:265a-26: de ring bdag ni gces pa'i mchog / mchod sbyin mchog gi 'bras bu bdag / lus kyi mchog tu bdag gyur to //
T02TD2905E:265a-27: de nas rang gi lag tu spos thogs te /
T02TD2905E:265a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la /
T02TD2905E:265a-29: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su dgongs par bsams te /
T02TD2905E:265a-30: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus pa //
T02TD2905E:265a-31: ding du bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2905E:265a-32: che ge zhes bya'i rdor 'dzin bdag / dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar 'tshal //
T02TD2905E:265a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir byon cig / rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te //
T02TD2905E:265a-34: dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol //
T02TD2905E:265a-35: de skad ces brjod la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD2905E:265a-36: 'od zer 'phros shing bsdus pa las bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin ba'i skur blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:265a-37: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2905E:265a-38: phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:265a-39: de nas las kyi rdo rje slob dpon shar phyogs su 'dug la /
T02TD2905E:265a-40: lho phyogs kyis dang por byas pa'i lan gsum bskor te /
T02TD2905E:265a-41: mchod pa rnam pa lnga yis mchod la /
T02TD2905E:265b-0: dbang phyug chen @265b po'i gzugs kyis shar phyogs nas dkyil 'khor zhu bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:265b-1: phyogs gzhan nas kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2905E:265b-2: de nas slob ma byang chub sems dpas brjod par bya /
T02TD2905E:265b-3: 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD2905E:265b-4: chos kyis rgyal po chen po khyod //
T02TD2905E:265b-5: 'byung po kun dang klu rnams dang //
T02TD2905E:265b-7: bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2905E:265b-8: sdug bsngal nyon mongs thams cad 'joms //
T02TD2905E:265b-9: gza' rnams kun dang ro langs dang //
T02TD2905E:265b-10: yi dags dang ni bdud rnams 'joms //
T02TD2905E:265b-11: grub pa thams cad ster mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2905E:265b-12: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2905E:265b-13: de nas las kyi rdo rje slob dpon langs la /
T02TD2905E:265b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' khams gang bar bsam la /
T02TD2905E:265b-16: bdag ni legs mdzad rdo rje che //
T02TD2905E:265b-17: bdag ni rdo rje stobs po che //
T02TD2905E:265b-18: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
T02TD2905E:265b-19: lag na rdo rje brtan par gnas //
T02TD2905E:265b-20: bdag ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD2905E:265b-21: byin gyis brlabs ba mi gtong ngo //
T02TD2905E:265b-22: de nas rdo rje slob dpon dam tshig gsum gyi rnyed pa dang ldan pas /
T02TD2905E:265b-23: rang nyid kyi phyag rgya rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la /
T02TD2905E:265b-24: rdo rje dril bu gzung bar bya //
T02TD2905E:265b-25: dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la //
T02TD2905E:265b-26: 'di nyid bzung nas bya ba yi //
T02TD2905E:265b-29: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bltas la /
T02TD2905E:265b-30: rang nyid langs la khro bo'i lta bas yi ge hi: las skyes pa'i mig gnyis blta bas bgegs thams cad bsregs te /
T02TD2905E:265b-31: de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:265b-32: phyogs thams cad du blta shing 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:265b-33: rang nyid lha'i nga rgyal dbang ldan pas sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:265b-34: yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa la //
T02TD2905E:265b-35: sna tshogs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'od zer gyis sa gzhi thams cad khengs par bsam zhing rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bcags par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:265b-36: shar la sogs ba'i bgegs rnams dang /
T02TD2905E:265b-37: phyogs kyi yang phur bus btab la /
T02TD2905E:265b-38: rdo rje'i ra ba dang gur bsams te /
T02TD2905E:265b-39: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dang sbyor bas //
T02TD2905E:265b-40: ko sko ao la mdud pa mnan la //
T02TD2905E:265b-41: g-yon nga rgyal du blta bas dpa' //
T02TD2905E:266a-2: steng dang 'og kyang byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2905E:266a-3: bhur bhu ba pa tsam bandha ya ta /
T02TD2905E:266a-4: sngags kyi rgyal po h'um brjod pas //
T02TD2905E:266a-5: nyes pa kun gyis tshugs ma yin //
T02TD2905E:266a-6: de nas aom badzra mandal la h'um dza: //
T02TD2905E:266a-7: 'di yis rdo rje khu tshur gnyis brkyang la /
T02TD2905E:266a-8: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:266a-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:266a-11: aom badzra badzre aa dhi tishtha siddhi h'um /
T02TD2905E:266a-12: de nas rdo rje bskor ba'i phyag rgya byas te brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:266a-13: de nas seng ldeng gi phur ba la bzlas pa byas te /
T02TD2905E:266a-20: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2905E:266a-25: de dag kyang sku smad phur pa'i dpal dang ldan pa /
T02TD2905E:266a-26: tsandan dmar po'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD2905E:266a-27: skud pa dmar pos dkris te /
T02TD2905E:266a-28: me tog dmar pos brgyan te /
T02TD2905E:266a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi zur dang /
T02TD2905E:266a-30: phyogs rnams su lag pa g-yon pas bzung ste /
T02TD2905E:266a-31: g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:266a-32: log 'dren gyi mtshams la sogs pa ru /
T02TD2905E:266a-33: sngags 'dis phur bu brdeg par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:266a-34: aom badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sarba bighn'am bandha bandha h'um phat /
T02TD2905E:266a-35: 'dir de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi khu tshur gyis go bgo ste /
T02TD2905E:266a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi sgor nyes pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod la //
T02TD2905E:266a-38: bum pa lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:266a-39: dri bzang po dang bcas pa'i chu blugs te /
T02TD2905E:266a-40: lha thams cad kyi ming dang bcas pa nam mkha' la gnas pa /
T02TD2905E:266a-41: snying po'i 'od zer gyis bkug ste /
T02TD2905E:266a-45: bum pa yang nag po spangs pa mgrin pa ring ba /
T02TD2905E:266a-48: me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i ras zung gis mgul dkris /
T02TD2905E:266a-49: 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing gis brgyan pa /
T02TD2905E:266a-51: rigs kyi lha'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa /
T02TD2905E:266b-0: rin po che bdun nam rdza las byas pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i @266b bum pa'o //
T02TD2905E:266b-1: de yang nang du byi ru dang /
T02TD2905E:266b-2: gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang /
T02TD2905E:266b-3: padma r'a ga'i rin po che rnams nang du bcug la /
T02TD2905E:266b-4: gzhan yang sman bri ha ti dang /
T02TD2905E:266b-7: aa pa r'a dzi ta dkar po dang /
T02TD2905E:266b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2905E:266b-16: zhabs bsil dang bcas mchod cing bstod de /
T02TD2905E:266b-17: yi ge h'um brjod pa las /
T02TD2905E:266b-18: bcom ldan 'das yongs su rdzogs pa'i skur bltas lar rab tu mchod de /
T02TD2905E:266b-19: bgegs rnams 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2905E:266b-20: phreng ba'am ma brgyus pa'i me tog gam /
T02TD2905E:266b-22: de nas yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2905E:266b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:266b-25: thun gsum du yang dag par mchod cing /
T02TD2905E:266b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bum pa gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:266b-27: 'di ni bum pa rab tu gnas par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2905E:266b-28: de nas brgya byin la sogs pa shar la sogs pa'i phyogs nas rang rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs la /
T02TD2905E:266b-29: mchod yon la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2905E:266b-30: me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2905E:266b-31: aom sa ra sa ra gatstsha ga tstsha:/
T02TD2905E:266b-32: de la sogs pas gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2905E:266b-33: steng nas kyang zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02TD2905E:266b-35: mig gyen du bltas te gshegs /
T02TD2905E:266b-36: 'og tu yang aa su re bhya:sva' ha'/
T02TD2905E:266b-38: so sor yang rdo rje'i sor mo gyen du phye nas /
T02TD2905E:266b-39: rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2905E:266b-42: me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas brgyan pa'i gtor ma byin zhing lha rnams spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:266b-43: de nas ras dkar pos bum pa rnams g-yogs te /
T02TD2905E:266b-44: lha rnams kha sbyor dang ldan pa 'byung po dang bcas pa la /
T02TD2905E:266b-45: ye ta ya te ma h'a bh'u to ro tra sth'a na pra munytsantu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2905E:266b-46: de nas sngags de nyid kyis lha bshos la sogs pa dbul te /
T02TD2905E:266b-47: so sor 'byung po chen po rnams /
T02TD2905E:266b-48: rang rang gnas su ci bder gshegs par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:266b-49: dur khrod chen po lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2905E:267a-1: dang ni chu bo'i gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2905E:267a-2: lam gyi bzhi mdo lingga gcig pa dang //
T02TD2905E:267a-3: lha'i gnas rnams su myur du gshegs byas la //
T02TD2905E:267a-4: dam tshig gnas la rab tu gnas par mdzod //
T02TD2905E:267a-5: ji ltar khyod ni mi 'gro na //
T02TD2905E:267a-6: khyed kyi mgo ni rdo rjes 'gems //
T02TD2905E:267a-7: yud tsam gyis ni nyams par 'gyur//
T02TD2905E:267a-8: dmyal ba chen por 'jug par byed ;
T02TD2905E:267a-9: / ji lta ji ltar ci bde bar //
T02TD2905E:267a-10: rang gi gnas su bde bar song //
T02TD2905E:267a-11: yang mchod yon la sogs pa byin la /
T02TD2905E:267a-12: mchod de ci bde bar gshegs par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:267a-17: de dag tu myur du 'gro bar 'gyur te ;
T02TD2905E:267a-19: dam tshig la rab tu brtan par dam tshig rnams rab tu skyong zhing /
T02TD2905E:267a-20: khro bo chen po'i bka' stsal ji ltar mnos pas /
T02TD2905E:267a-21: rang rang gi las rnams byed par 'gyur te /
T02TD2905E:267a-22: ru trasth'a na pra munytsa ntu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2905E:267a-23: de nas aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a na'm aa dy'a nutpa nn tv'ata /
T02TD2905E:267a-24: 'di ni dbyangs chen pos 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:267a-25: mchod yon la sogs pa sbyin pa 'di ni gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2905E:267a-27: rgyas pa la nyes pa rnams 'joms par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2905E:267a-29: sngags brgya phrag brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2905E:267a-32: slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:267a-33: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i mgo la me tog bzhag ste /
T02TD2905E:267a-34: slob mas lag par me tog thogs te /
T02TD2905E:267a-36: bdag gi ston pa dga' chen po //
T02TD2905E:267a-37: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD2905E:267a-38: / byang chub sems mgon brtan pa po //
T02TD2905E:267a-39: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2905E:267a-40: bdag la byang chub sems kyang stsol //
T02TD2905E:267a-41: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2905E:267a-42: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2905E:267a-43: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2905E:267a-45: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor slob ma bzhag la /
T02TD2905E:267a-46: snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2905E:267a-47: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las tam las bskyed pa'i rdo rje bsams la g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la /
T02TD2905E:267a-48: slob ma'i snying gar reg cing /
T02TD2905E:267a-49: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho badzra sidhya ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2905E:267b-0: sa @267b 'dir slob dpon gyis sdig pa bshags par bya ba'i don du //
T02TD2905E:267b-1: phyag 'tshal bde gshegs thams cad la //
T02TD2905E:267b-2: ji ltar thams cad mkhyen po //
T02TD2905E:267b-3: 'khor ba kun gyi skyabs mdzod cig / bdag ni nye bar skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2905E:267b-4: gtso bo kun du bsgom par bgyi //
T02TD2905E:267b-5: sdug bsngal gsum las grol ba'i phyir //
T02TD2905E:267b-6: 'jig rten sdug bsngal bdag gis mthong //
T02TD2905E:267b-7: thams cad byed par gnas pa yi //
T02TD2905E:267b-8: sdug bsngal gsum gyis thams cad gdungs //
T02TD2905E:267b-9: bdag ni khyed la dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD2905E:267b-10: bdag ni khyed kyis bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2905E:267b-11: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02TD2905E:267b-12: phyin chad sdig pa bdag mi bgyi //
T02TD2905E:267b-13: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rangs //
T02TD2905E:267b-14: byas dang byed bcug dge ba la //
T02TD2905E:267b-15: bdag ni de bzhin mngon par dga' //
T02TD2905E:267b-16: chos gsung mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2905E:267b-17: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2905E:267b-18: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2905E:267b-19: mchog tu stsol ba chen po yis //
T02TD2905E:267b-20: bdag ni sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog //
T02TD2905E:267b-21: sangs rgyas dbang phyug gnas pa yis //
T02TD2905E:267b-22: 'khor ba thams cad bsgral don du //
T02TD2905E:267b-23: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mthar phyin te //
T02TD2905E:267b-24: sangs rgyas rgyu la bkod pa'i phyir ;
T02TD2905E:267b-25: / ji ltar bzod pa'i stobs rnams kyis //
T02TD2905E:267b-26: smon lam chen po gdab par bgyi //
T02TD2905E:267b-27: de ltar gyur pa'i stobs kyis su //
T02TD2905E:267b-28: 'di ltar rigs dang rigs skyes kyang //
T02TD2905E:267b-29: thabs kyis 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2905E:267b-30: thams cad mnyam pa'i go 'phang pa //
T02TD2905E:267b-31: dri med stong pa'i yo tan can //
T02TD2905E:267b-32: rigs las byas pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2905E:267b-33: byas dang byed du bcug pa yi //
T02TD2905E:267b-34: bdag gi bsod nams ci mchis pas //
T02TD2905E:267b-35: grub cing bde ba'i gnas phyin shog //
T02TD2905E:267b-36: de nas rin chen dpal mos lag pa na dri thogs pa /
T02TD2905E:267b-38: thig le mchog mas bdug spos dang /
T02TD2905E:267b-39: ri bong 'dzin mas mar me thogs pa rnams kyis mchod la /
T02TD2905E:267b-43: byang chub kyi shing las byas ba'i so shing dri dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02TD2905E:267b-44: so 'brud pa'i tshul gyis gzung la dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:267b-45: rdo rje chos kyis bzlas pa'i dri bzang po'i mchod yon gyi chus kha bshal byin la /
T02TD2905E:268a-0: aom hr'i:bishuddha: sarba dharma sarba p'a pa nam tsa sya sarba bi ka lp'an aa pa na @268a * //
T02TD2905E:268a-2: rdo rje rnon po chen po 'di //
T02TD2905E:268a-3: yongs su rdzogs shing ma nyams pa //
T02TD2905E:268a-4: gcig ni mgo bo gzhan ni bstan //
T02TD2905E:268a-6: bzlas pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:268a-7: sngas dang stan du byin la /
T02TD2905E:268a-9: skud pa sum sgril rang gis slob ma'i dpung pa g-yon pa la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:268a-10: de yang yi ge drug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2905E:268a-12: slob ma la chos bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2905E:268a-13: de ring khyod ni dga' ba yi //
T02TD2905E:268a-14: rnyed pa chen po khyed kyis rnyed //
T02TD2905E:268a-15: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2905E:268a-16: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa khyod //
T02TD2905E:268a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes su bzung //
T02TD2905E:268a-18: bdag nyid chen po rgyal ba'i sras //
T02TD2905E:268a-19: khyod ni theg pa chen po la //
T02TD2905E:268a-20: dga' ba'i rigs can thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2905E:268a-21: 'di ni lam gyi mchog yin te //
T02TD2905E:268a-22: dpal dang ldan pa'i theg pa che //
T02TD2905E:268a-23: lam 'di la ni khyod phyin na //
T02TD2905E:268a-24: de bzhin gshegs par khyod 'gyur ro //
T02TD2905E:268a-25: rang byung bskal pa che dang ldan //
T02TD2905E:268a-27: yod dang med pa'i de nyid spangs //
T02TD2905E:268a-28: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
T02TD2905E:268a-29: zab mo rtog ge'i yul las 'das //
T02TD2905E:268a-30: rtog dpyod yul las 'das pa po //
T02TD2905E:268a-31: thams cad lnga ru gnas pas te //
T02TD2905E:268a-32: lnga pa kun kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2905E:268a-33: las dang spyod par gnas pa kun //
T02TD2905E:268a-34: gnyis med bden pa'i dpal dang ldan //
T02TD2905E:268a-35: 'di ni theg pa chen po'i mchog /'dir 'dra khyod kyis thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2905E:268a-36: de skad ces slob ma la brjod par byas la slob ma rnams bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:268a-37: rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' drin gyis khyed kyis nang par grol ba'i grong khyer chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2905E:268a-38: bdug pa la sogs pa ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa rnams shoms shig //
T02TD2905E:268a-40: bcom ldan 'das che ge mo rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2905E:268a-41: dkyil 'khor snying rje chen po bdag / nang par bdag ni 'dri bar 'dod //
T02TD2905E:268a-42: slob ma rjes su gzung phyir dang//
T02TD2905E:268a-43: khyed rnams cis kyang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2905E:268a-44: 'di ltar bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD2905E:268a-45: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin mdzod //
T02TD2905E:268a-46: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la //
T02TD2905E:268a-47: che ge dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i mchog / nang par sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2905E:268a-48: ji ltar 'byor ba'i stobs kyis so //
T02TD2905E:268b-0: rjes su gzung ba'i @268b thabs kyi ni //
T02TD2905E:268b-1: bdag gi slob ma gang yin la //
T02TD2905E:268b-2: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2905E:268b-3: de skad ces lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2905E:268b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor legs par mchod //
T02TD2905E:268b-5: mchod yon la sogs pa yang phul te /
T02TD2905E:268b-6: las kyi rdo rjes slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su nyal la 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:268b-7: gzhan nyi ma la lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2905E:268b-8: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bltas te /
T02TD2905E:268b-14: don grub btags pas kyang byugs te /
T02TD2905E:268b-15: de ltar skud pa lnga rnams so sor bzhag ste /
T02TD2905E:268b-17: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su bsams la //
T02TD2905E:268b-18: de dag kyang rang rang gi gnas su byin gyis brlab cing sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pa dang /
T02TD2905E:268b-19: rang gi snying ga las kyang 'od zer 'phros te /
T02TD2905E:268b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
T02TD2905E:268b-21: aom d'i pta drishti aam ku sha dza:/
T02TD2905E:268b-22: 'di ni mig lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD2905E:268b-23: mig phyogs thams cad du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:268b-24: rdzi ma brdabs te mig rab tu bgrad pas /
T02TD2905E:268b-25: srad bu na nam mkha' la brkyang ba la blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:268b-26: chos rnams thams cad rjes su gcig pa la //
T02TD2905E:268b-27: spro zhing bsdus pas rjes su brtan par byas /
T02TD2905E:268b-28: chos rnams thams cad de nyid gcig pa yin //
T02TD2905E:268b-29: h'um zhes brjod la gcig tu bsgril lo //
T02TD2905E:268b-30: de nas gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag cing mchod la /
T02TD2905E:268b-31: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:268b-33: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD2905E:268b-34: 'di ni lan brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod la /
T02TD2905E:268b-35: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la /
T02TD2905E:268b-36: nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams rab tu brtan pa la /
T02TD2905E:268b-37: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2905E:268b-38: mig gnyis su yi ge dza: yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD2905E:268b-39: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la /
T02TD2905E:268b-40: byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs kyis /
T02TD2905E:268b-41: g-yon pa'i khu tshur skud pa lte bar bzung ste /
T02TD2905E:268b-42: aom dza:dza:dza:de skad ces brjod pas /
T02TD2905E:268b-43: byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa pos kyang /
T02TD2905E:268b-44: yang aom dza:dza:dza:zhes brjod cing slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad do //
T02TD2905E:268b-45: de ltar slob dpon dang slob ma gdong phyogs pas /
T02TD2905E:269a-1: dang lho yang slob spon gyi gnas yin /
T02TD2905E:269a-2: shar dang byang na slob dpon gyi gnas so //
T02TD2905E:269a-3: de skad ces nam mkha' la thig btab la /
T02TD2905E:269a-4: sems kyis phyogs dang mtshams cad kyi phyogs mnyam par bgos te /
T02TD2905E:269a-5: de nyid kyi rim pas sa gzhi la tshangs pa'i thig la sogs pa gdab ste /
T02TD2905E:269a-6: thig skud sboms su dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i nyi shu cha /
T02TD2905E:269a-8: de yang rdo rje khu tshur gyis skud pa shar phyogs su bzung la /
T02TD2905E:269a-10: gnod sbyin dang yi dags dang lha dang /
T02TD2905E:269a-11: klu dang dbang phyug dang bden bral gyi phyogs su gdong blta zhing /
T02TD2905E:269a-12: me dang rlung ni slob dpon gyi gnas yin la /
T02TD2905E:269a-13: shar dang nub dang byang dang phyogs bzhin mnyam par thig btab la /
T02TD2905E:269a-14: de yang cha brgyad du mnyam par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:269a-15: de yang skud pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs zhing dgongs par bsam mo //
T02TD2905E:269a-16: de yang slob dpon slob ma'i g-yas su bskor zhing 'gro bar bya ste /
T02TD2905E:269a-17: me dang rlung ni rtag tu slob dpon gyi gnas yin /
T02TD2905E:269a-18: srin po dang dbang ldan rnams su yang zur gyi thig rnams gdab po //
T02TD2905E:269a-19: grub zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2905E:269a-20: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2905E:269a-21: cha rnams bcu drug dang ldan zhing //
T02TD2905E:269a-22: rdo rje'i ra bas kun nas bskor /
T02TD2905E:269a-23: de ltar du ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD2905E:269a-24: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bzhi ste /
T02TD2905E:269a-25: snying po'i lte ba dang re'u mig brgyad dang ldan pa /
T02TD2905E:269a-26: phyi rol nas rdo rje'i rabs kun nas bskor ba /
T02TD2905E:269a-27: gnyis gnyis dad ldan pa'i cha gsum dang /
T02TD2905E:269a-28: thams cad kyi dbus su brgyad cha'i sgo tshad dang /
T02TD2905E:269a-29: sgo'i phyed kyis sgo khyud dang /
T02TD2905E:269a-32: 'gram pa'i phyed kyis rdul tshon gyis dang /
T02TD2905E:269a-33: de nas 'gram pa'i tshad kyis dang /
T02TD2905E:269a-34: mchod pa'i snam bu'i tshad kyis dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i sa'o //
T02TD2905E:269a-35: rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad kyis ni rdul tshon gyi sa yin la /
T02TD2905E:269a-36: sgo'i sum 'gyur gyis rta babs so //
T02TD2905E:269a-37: phyogs kyi gnas dang snying po'i gnas de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:269a-43: de nas kyil 'khor lte bar phur pa btab la /
T02TD2905E:269a-44: phyi rol nas kun nas bskor bar bya ste /
T02TD2905E:269b-0: de bzhin ri mo @269b gnyis kyis bskor /
T02TD2905E:269b-2: kha dog lnga pa'i bzhi yang /
T02TD2905E:269b-4: 'khor lo gru bzhi mnyam pa la bskor bar bya /
T02TD2905E:269b-6: cha bcu drug dang ldan pa /
T02TD2905E:269b-7: gnas brgyad zlum por bskor te /
T02TD2905E:269b-8: rdo rje phreng bas kun nas bskor ba /
T02TD2905E:269b-9: thams cad kyang sngon du bshad pa'i mdog dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2905E:269b-10: de nas yi ge hi las mig g-yas pa dang /
T02TD2905E:269b-11: g-yon pa gnyis zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du byas la /
T02TD2905E:269b-13: ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2905E:269b-14: de nas pam lam ram ham dzam gi sa bon las /
T02TD2905E:269b-15: rim pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2905E:269b-16: skud pa'i kha dog bzhin du dkar po la sogs pa rnams kyang byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:269b-19: ba bla la sogs pa'i khams gzhan nam /
T02TD2905E:269b-20: 'bras khar ba la sogs pa'i 'bru rnams kyis kyang rung ste /
T02TD2905E:269b-21: yang na so phag la sogs pa'i sa rnams kyang bya'o //
T02TD2905E:269b-23: sa bon 'di dag yongs su rdzogs pa las /
T02TD2905E:269b-24: rang rang gi kha dog gi rigs bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:269b-25: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2905E:269b-26: de bzhin du rdul tshon rnams la /
T02TD2905E:269b-27: sa bon gyi 'od zer las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs te bstims la /
T02TD2905E:269b-28: yi ge hr'i: las gzi brjid dang ldan zhing /
T02TD2905E:269b-29: rdo rje khro bo nyi ma'i lta bas bltas la /
T02TD2905E:269b-31: yi ge a'a brjod cing sngags dang phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2905E:269b-32: rdul tshon rnams rab tu 'bar bar bsam mo //
T02TD2905E:269b-33: rdo rje khu chur bcas la /
T02TD2905E:269b-34: snying ga'i h'um las 'od zer dri ma med pa 'phros te 'bar bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2905E:269b-35: a'a rya dz'al mandal h'um phat /
T02TD2905E:269b-36: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btab pa'i phur pa yi ge h'um brjod cing /
T02TD2905E:269b-37: rang gi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag par bzung ngo //
T02TD2905E:269b-38: phur pa'i khung bu yang rdul tshon lngas dgod do //
T02TD2905E:269b-39: rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la /
T02TD2905E:269b-40: rdo rje glu blang zhing dga' ba dang ldan pas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:269b-41: 'di ni chos dbyangs dag pa ste //
T02TD2905E:269b-42: sems can khams ni grol bar byed //
T02TD2905E:269b-43: bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal //
T02TD2905E:269b-44: rdul tshon gzhir bkod par bya //
T02TD2905E:269b-45: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis log 'dren gyi phyogs nas /
T02TD2905E:269b-46: ji ltar bde bar rdul tshon dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-0: de yang mnyam par srab ma thug med par g-yas su bskor @270a * //
T02TD2905E:270a-6: sngon po rnams rim pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-7: gnas gnyis pa la dkar po dang /
T02TD2905E:270a-10: kha dog gsum gyi spyin par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-11: nang gi gnas gnyis la nag po 'ba' zhig gis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-12: de dag kyang spom phra sgo'i tshad tsam gyi ri mo bcad cing nas kyi tshang tsam du spom par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-13: de yang shar phyogs dkar po /
T02TD2905E:270a-16: lus ngan po'i phyogs ljang gu /
T02TD2905E:270a-19: bgegs kyi mtshan ma dang ldan na bgegs 'joms par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:270a-20: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-21: de'i dus su yi ge ham las glang po che'i gdan de'i steng du yi ge aom las padma dang nyi ma'i gdan /
T02TD2905E:270a-22: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rang gi bzhugs stangs dang kha dog gis gnas pa la /
T02TD2905E:270a-23: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2905E:270a-24: yi ge h'um brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la bstim par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-25: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:270a-26: dbang phyug chen po rang gi kha dog dang gdan dang bzhugs thabs mngon rtogs sgrub thabs las bshad pa bzhin du /
T02TD2905E:270a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi shar phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-29: 'khor lo thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2905E:270a-31: bstim zhing yi ge h'um gis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2905E:270a-32: ji ltar gshegs su gsol ba'i tshe /
T02TD2905E:270a-33: lag pa rdo rje dang ldan pas thig rnams steng du bteg ste gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2905E:270a-34: de nas sngon du bshad pa'i bum pa dri bzang po'i chus bkang ba me tog gis brgyan pa brgyad dbang ldan la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270a-35: de nas rdo rje slob dpon khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas /
T02TD2905E:270a-36: gos sngon po bgos te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bcings la /
T02TD2905E:270a-37: dril bu dkrol zhing bskor ba lan gsum bya sti /
T02TD2905E:270a-38: me tog sngon pos mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su song la gar bya zhing /
T02TD2905E:270a-39: me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2905E:270a-40: gar bya zhing mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2905E:270a-42: badzrod gha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD2905E:270a-43: rang nyid khro bo chen po'i nga rgyal gyis shar sgo nas song ste//
T02TD2905E:270b-1: lho dang byang gi yang sgor phyin te /
T02TD2905E:270b-2: de nas rol pa'i gar gyis /
T02TD2905E:270b-3: de nas shar gyi sgor bum pa'i phyi rol tu phyin la /
T02TD2905E:270b-4: me tog gi gcal bkram ste /
T02TD2905E:270b-7: sngags 'di brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya ba'o //
T02TD2905E:270b-8: me tog gi phreng ba blangs la yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270b-9: de nas dkyil 'khor la lan gsum bskor te /
T02TD2905E:270b-10: bskor ba gsum byas la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i mdun du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270b-11: yang bum pa gnyis pa blangs la brgya phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270b-12: bum pa gnyis pa'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma'i mgo la gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270b-13: khro bo chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcing zhing bstims la /
T02TD2905E:270b-14: dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan ma can gyi bum pa la sogs pa blangs te /
T02TD2905E:270b-15: rang rang gi sngags kyis brgya phrag brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2905E:270b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270b-17: chu yis gang bas de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2905E:270b-22: me lha rnams la bum pa gcig go //
T02TD2905E:270b-25: rin chen dpal mo chen mo dang /
T02TD2905E:270b-26: de'i rim pas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2905E:270b-27: bum ba bcu las nyung ba ni ma yin la /
T02TD2905E:270b-28: bum pa bcu rnam par gang bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2905E:270b-29: de ltar dkyil 'khor de mngon sum du gnas pa la mchod cing /
T02TD2905E:270b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsi tta pra na me na badzra bandha n'am ka ro m'i ti pra na mya /
T02TD2905E:270b-31: sngon du bshad pa'i skyabs dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya zhing sngom pa yang gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:270b-32: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2905E:270b-33: sems can la ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD2905E:270b-34: ji ltar gus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ne des mdzad pa //
T02TD2905E:270b-35: tshul khrim sdom pa rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2905E:270b-36: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2905E:270b-37: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum /
T02TD2905E:270b-38: bdag gis kyang ni brtan par gzung //
T02TD2905E:270b-39: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te /
T02TD2905E:270b-40: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2905E:270b-41: mchog tu gus pas gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2905E:270b-42: sngom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor can //
T02TD2905E:270b-43: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2905E:270b-44: bdag gis de nyid gzung bar bgyi//
T02TD2905E:271a-0: @271a * // rdo rje chen po'i rigs dag la //
T02TD2905E:271a-1: sbyin pa rnam bzhi so sor sbyin //
T02TD2905E:271a-2: nyin re bzhin la'ang dus drug tu //
T02TD2905E:271a-3: rin chen po'i rigs mchog sbyor //
T02TD2905E:271a-4: ting 'dzin rab tu dga' ba yis //
T02TD2905E:271a-5: chos rnams thams cad gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2905E:271a-6: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2905E:271a-7: padma chen po'i rigs dag pa//
T02TD2905E:271a-8: byang chub chen po'i rigs byung ba //
T02TD2905E:271a-9: sngom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2905E:271a-10: de nyid bdag gis gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2905E:271a-11: mchod pa'i las rnams ci 'byor ba //
T02TD2905E:271a-12: las kyi rigs ni chen po la //
T02TD2905E:271a-13: mchog tu bskyed par bgyi ba ni //
T02TD2905E:271a-14: byang chub sems ni rjes bsgral ba //
T02TD2905E:271a-15: sdom pa gzung bar bgyi ba ni //
T02TD2905E:271a-16: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2905E:271a-17: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2905E:271a-18: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
T02TD2905E:271a-19: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2905E:271a-20: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2905E:271a-21: de nas nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing go cha bgos te /
T02TD2905E:271a-22: h'um bzlas shing gos sngon po gyon te /
T02TD2905E:271a-23: phrag pa phung de gtsug tor dang ldan pas /
T02TD2905E:271a-24: me tog gi phreng ba'i do shal byas la /
T02TD2905E:271a-26: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
T02TD2905E:271a-27: sgo srung gi sngags bzlas shing /
T02TD2905E:271a-28: gos sngon pos stod bcings la /
T02TD2905E:271a-29: phyi rol du gnas pa la bum pa'i chus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:271a-30: khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2905E:271a-31: slob ma la 'og cha bskon cing bsrung ba byas la //
T02TD2905E:271a-32: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:271a-33: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2905E:271a-34: de ma thag tu dngos grub thob //
T02TD2905E:271a-35: khro bo'i rgyal po grub pa'i bdag //
T02TD2905E:271a-36: dam tshig lha rnams brtan par byed //
T02TD2905E:271a-37: de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2905E:271a-38: badzra kro dha h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD2905E:271a-40: nang du gzhug cing brjod par bya ba ni /
T02TD2905E:271a-41: rdo rje khro bo rang gis dbab pa bya ste /
T02TD2905E:271a-43: de las sogs pa'i sngags kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:271a-44: phreng ba bzhag cing gdong pa dkrol la /
T02TD2905E:271a-45: de nas chu'i dbang dam tshig gsum sbyin zhing /
T02TD2905E:271a-46: bcom ldan 'das thams cad slob dpon gyi gzugs kyi gnas par sngon du brjod pa'i rim pas bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:271a-47: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi don du dbang rdzas sbyin zhing /
T02TD2905E:271a-48: tshigs su bcad pa lnga yis bstod la yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags brjod cing phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2905E:271b-0: lung bstan pa bzung zhing yang rdo rje'i @271b mchog sbyin par byed pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod /
T02TD2905E:271b-1: che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming gis dkyil 'khor bsgos na rim pa 'dis /
T02TD2905E:271b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya dang sngags bzlas pas /
T02TD2905E:271b-3: aa'i dbang phyug de'i gnas su khro bo'i rdo rje rang gis bzung zhing /
T02TD2905E:271b-4: khro bo'i nga rgyal byas la //
T02TD2905E:271b-5: de nas rdo rje chen po bzung bo ;
T02TD2905E:271b-6: / khro bo'i bdag po chen po chen po'i nga rgyal du gnas pas /
T02TD2905E:271b-7: de nas sngon khro bo'i dbang po 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya bshad pa //
T02TD2905E:271b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu bstod cing /
T02TD2905E:271b-9: sngon gyi nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags bzlas te /
T02TD2905E:271b-13: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul zhing /
T02TD2905E:271b-15: dza:h'um bam ho: sa maya stvam /
T02TD2905E:271b-16: de skad ces sgrub pa pos brjod la /
T02TD2905E:271b-17: de lha chen po la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:271b-18: sgrung thabs dang phyag rgyu dang dbang yongs su rdzogs par byas ba la /
T02TD2905E:271b-19: nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2905E:271b-20: bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing /
T02TD2905E:271b-22: gos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2905E:271b-23: dpag tu med pa'i pi wang dang /
T02TD2905E:271b-24: rgyal mtshan mang pos mchod cing /
T02TD2905E:271b-27: de nas me tog dang spos dang bdug pa dang mar me dang /
T02TD2905E:271b-28: zhal zas rnams kyis mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:271b-31: ji ltar 'byor ba'i dri yis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:271b-36: 'di ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2905E:271b-37: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um /
T02TD2905E:271b-39: de dag gis dpag tu med pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rnams spros shing //
T02TD2905E:271b-45: btung ba rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:271b-46: aom aa k'a mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
T02TD2905E:271b-49: ral gri'i phyag rgyas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:271b-50: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sor mo rnams bsgul zhing rol mo'i phyag rgyas yi ge h'um brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:272a-3: aom brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:272a-6: da bzhin du rta babs dang /
T02TD2905E:272a-10: aom sarba bid p'u ra p'u ra a'a barta a'a brta ho //
T02TD2905E:272a-11: de nas rdo rje sor mo rnams spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2905E:272a-12: sngon gyi aom brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:272a-13: byang phyogs su las kyi rdo rje slob dpon gnas nas /
T02TD2905E:272a-16: yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags stong phrag gcig bzlas shing /
T02TD2905E:272a-17: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang bzlas bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:272a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su gdong phyogs nas /
T02TD2905E:272a-19: las thams cad pa'i thab tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02TD2905E:272a-20: me tog dang mar me rnams yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyi brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2905E:272a-21: dbang phyug chen pos gtso byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la sngags bdun bdun gyis dbul lo //
T02TD2905E:272a-23: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos me tog dang spos la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dbul zhing /
T02TD2905E:272a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2905E:272a-26: bdag ni sdom pa kun dang ldan //
T02TD2905E:272a-27: dam tshig mgon pos rjes su bzung //
T02TD2905E:272a-28: phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa rnams /
T02TD2905E:272a-29: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la //
T02TD2905E:272a-30: dpang por gnas par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2905E:272a-32: sangs rgyas gar mdzad sdom pa la /
T02TD2905E:272a-33: 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mdzod //
T02TD2905E:272a-34: rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer du /
T02TD2905E:272a-36: slob dpon chen po khyed kyis ni //
T02TD2905E:272a-37: gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2905E:272a-38: bdag ni skal bar ldan par mdzod //
T02TD2905E:272a-39: dbang bskur chen po la stsal du gsol //
T02TD2905E:272a-40: slob dpon bdag la sbyin par mdzod //
T02TD2905E:272a-41: mtshan rnams kun dang ldan pa po //
T02TD2905E:272a-42: bdag ni rjes su gzung du gsol //
T02TD2905E:272a-43: sangs rgyas sku bdag yid dga' ba //
T02TD2905E:272a-44: gter mdzod slob dpon chen po khyod //
T02TD2905E:272a-45: dbang bskur chen po stsal du gsol //
T02TD2905E:272a-46: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2905E:272a-47: bdag kyang slob dpon 'gyur bar mdzad //
T02TD2905E:272a-48: de skad slob dpon la mandal phul te zhu bar bya'o//
T02TD2905E:272b-0: @272b bdag ni slob dpon zhes pas //
T02TD2905E:272b-1: byang chub sems kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2905E:272b-4: de nas slob dpon gyis dri ba /
T02TD2905E:272b-5: skyes bu chen bu chen po khyod 'dod pa //
T02TD2905E:272b-6: gsang ba'i rigs ni dag pas te //
T02TD2905E:272b-7: dag ba bzhad mdzad zab mo gzung //
T02TD2905E:272b-8: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o /
T02TD2905E:272b-9: slob ma bdag ni 'do do zhes brjod la /
T02TD2905E:272b-10: de nas slob dpon dam tshig dang sdom pa dang ldan pas /
T02TD2905E:272b-11: ji ltar bka' btsal ba bzhin du bdag gis bgyis te /
T02TD2905E:272b-12: de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2905E:272b-13: 'gro ba dang bstan pa thams cad du //
T02TD2905E:272b-14: yang dbang bskur bar 'dod kyis sdom pa mi gzung po zhe na /
T02TD2905E:272b-15: de la dkyil 'khor kyang bstan par mi bya zhing dbab par mi bya'o //
T02TD2905E:272b-16: 'ga' zhig sdom pa dang dam tshig gzung bar 'dod pa la ni //
T02TD2905E:272b-17: slob dpon gyis rjes su bzung zhing //
T02TD2905E:272b-19: de nas nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod de /
T02TD2905E:272b-20: aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da a' mi //
T02TD2905E:272b-21: sngags 'di brjod la byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:272b-22: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje rab tu gnas par bya la /
T02TD2905E:272b-23: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho badzra sidhya ya tha' su kham /
T02TD2905E:272b-24: de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur te /
T02TD2905E:272b-25: de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba 'gyur gyis //
T02TD2905E:272b-26: khyod khyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste /
T02TD2905E:272b-27: gus pa dang bral ba rnams la yang ma yin no //
T02TD2905E:272b-28: de nas slob mas yon phul la /
T02TD2905E:272b-29: khro bo'i rgyal pos byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:272b-30: de'i rjes su brtan par gnas pa la //
T02TD2905E:272b-31: bum pa'i nang nas chu blangs pas gtor zhing mgo thog tu bzhag pas bsrung ste /
T02TD2905E:272b-32: khro bo'i rgyal po phyag rgyas go cha bskyon la /
T02TD2905E:272b-33: me tog sngon po'i thod bcing zhing /
T02TD2905E:272b-36: de las gsang ba'i sngags kyis dgug par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:272b-38: ma h'a su ra ta su dri dha su to sha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2905E:272b-39: badzra sa tva aartha si dhya m'am /
T02TD2905E:272b-40: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:272b-41: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2905E:272b-42: de ring rdo rje'i ye shes thob //
T02TD2905E:273a-0: ye shes de yis de ring @273a * //
T02TD2905E:273a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2905E:273a-3: dngos grub kyang ni thob 'gyur na /
T02TD2905E:273a-4: grub pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
T02TD2905E:273a-5: dkyil 'khor dam pa khyed kyis mthong //
T02TD2905E:273a-6: ma mthong ba la smra mi bya //
T02TD2905E:273a-7: gal te khyod kyis 'di smras na //
T02TD2905E:273a-8: dam tshig rnam par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2905E:273a-9: dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:273a-10: de skad ces slob ma'i mgo thog tu rdo rje bzhag la smra bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:273a-11: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD2905E:273a-12: khyod kyis gal te 'di smras na //
T02TD2905E:273a-14: de nas dam tshig gi chu sbyin par byas te /
T02TD2905E:273a-16: slob mas 'thung ba'i dus su 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:273a-17: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2905E:273a-18: khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas /
T02TD2905E:273a-20: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2905E:273a-22: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2905E:273a-23: dam tshig 'des na rlag par byed //
T02TD2905E:273a-24: dam tshig bsrungs na grub par gyur //
T02TD2905E:273a-25: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2905E:273a-26: gus pa dang ldan pa dang mig ldan pa'i bsam pa brtags la /
T02TD2905E:273a-27: slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:273a-28: de ring phan chod khyod kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yin te /
T02TD2905E:273a-29: ngas ji skad bstan pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02TD2905E:273a-30: de lta ma yin na khyod yid mi bde ba chen po dang bcas nas tshe'i dus byas te /
T02TD2905E:273a-31: dmyal bar 'jug par gyur ta re /
T02TD2905E:273a-32: de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge aa las 'od zer dmar po 'phros pas /
T02TD2905E:273a-33: sgo dbye ba'i phag rgya bcas te slob ma'i snying ga'i rdo rje la zhugs nas /
T02TD2905E:273a-34: lus thams cad khengs par bsam zhing /
T02TD2905E:273a-35: de nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:273a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02TD2905E:273a-37: rdo rje khro bo bdag la dbab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2905E:273a-38: de nas dbab pa'i phyag rgya snying gar bcas la /
T02TD2905E:273a-39: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:273a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' dran par bya /
T02TD2905E:273a-43: rdo rje ye shes rjes su sgrol //
T02TD2905E:273a-44: aom pra be sha badzra kro dha h'um h'um h'um aa /
T02TD2905E:273a-45: ji ltar nam mkha' las khro bo'i dbang pos 'bebs par bsam zhing sngags de brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:273a-46: des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na /
T02TD2905E:273a-47: de nas khro bo dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:273b-0: slob dpon g-yon @273b brkyang bas gnas la /
T02TD2905E:273b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bltas la /
T02TD2905E:273b-2: slob ma'i spyi bor gnas bar bsams la /
T02TD2905E:273b-3: 'od zer gyis lus gang bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2905E:273b-4: rlung gis rab tu g-yos ba la dmigs pa gtad de //
T02TD2905E:273b-5: h'um gis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:273b-6: rdo rje dpon rang nyid mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su gnas pas /
T02TD2905E:273b-7: h'um tr'am: hr'i: aa: sa bon 'di rnams 'od zer 'phros pa /
T02TD2905E:273b-8: slob ma'i khar 'jug par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:273b-9: aom pra be sha kro dha h'um h'um h'um aa: dzva l'ama la ku la ba kha na badzra aa /
T02TD2905E:273b-11: slob ma sdig pa mang po byas pas /
T02TD2905E:273b-12: sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:273b-13: sdig pa gzhom par byas te /
T02TD2905E:273b-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa sku mdog dmar po //
T02TD2905E:273b-15: 'od zer dmar po kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba bsam par byas la /
T02TD2905E:273b-16: h'um a'a: sngags 'di mang du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:273b-17: des kyang 'bab par ma gyur kyang /
T02TD2905E:273b-18: dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par ba'o //
T02TD2905E:273b-19: de'i tshe 'bab par gyur na mngon par shes ba lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2905E:273b-21: lce la rdo rje bsams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:273b-24: da ltar byung ba thams cad smos shig ces brjod pas smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2905E:273b-25: de nas snying gar rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2905E:273b-26: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba sha shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2905E:273b-27: dhi da ya me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho:'dis ye shes brtan par byas la /
T02TD2905E:273b-28: de nas yi ge t'am gis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2905E:273b-31: de nas slob ma'i mgo bo la me tog phreng ba bcings shing /
T02TD2905E:273b-32: sems can stobs chen khyod kyis ni //
T02TD2905E:273b-33: 'di nying yang dag gzung bar bya //
T02TD2905E:273b-34: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol zhing /
T02TD2905E:273b-35: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang /
T02TD2905E:273b-36: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
T02TD2905E:273b-37: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2905E:273b-38: phye bas mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02TD2905E:273b-40: de nas yi ge aam dang h'um gis mig gnyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2905E:273b-41: padma ti'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor lo brtan par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:273b-42: de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad kyis snying po'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa sgo rtsig pa kha dog lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD2905E:274a-0: lte ba la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od zer gyi phreng bas @274a * //
T02TD2905E:274a-2: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng du 'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i steng mnyes pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po lag pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha bltas la /
T02TD2905E:274a-3: de nas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i don du slob ma bkra shis la bskor ba gsum ste /
T02TD2905E:274a-4: bkra shis la sogs pa yang rdo rje 'dzin pas bya ste /
T02TD2905E:274a-5: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2905E:274a-6: sngags kyis gnas drug tu byin gyis brlabs par byas te /
T02TD2905E:274a-7: rol ba'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa la /
T02TD2905E:274a-8: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'byung po gzhan rnams kyis kyang yi ge h'um gi sgra sgrogs shing /
T02TD2905E:274a-9: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dkar po dang /
T02TD2905E:274a-11: aom bzlas shing kha dog sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang /
T02TD2905E:274a-13: de dag la sogs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2905E:274a-14: me tog la sogs pas kyang mchod de /
T02TD2905E:274a-18: de dag la sogs pa'i rol mo dpag tu med pa dang /
T02TD2905E:274a-21: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing /
T02TD2905E:274a-22: bstod pa'i tshogs kyi kyang bstod la /
T02TD2905E:274a-23: sgo skyong gi 'gram nas bum pa blangs la /
T02TD2905E:274a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi bum pas spyi bor dbang bskur zhing chu'i kyang gtor la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:274a-25: aom bh'u: shr'isi ddha dhva dza shodha ni ni hr'i:badzra aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD2905E:274a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i chus kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:274a-30: h'um badzra aadhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi dri dho me bha ba dza: h'um bam ho: h'um phat /
T02TD2905E:274a-34: de nas rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan la /
T02TD2905E:274a-39: yi ges dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2905E:274a-40: rdo rje bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /

T02TD2905E:274b-1: rdo rje dbyings kyi de nyid las /

T02TD2905E:274b-30: yod dang med pa'i ngo bo spangs //
T02TD2905E:274b-31: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' che //

T02TD2905E:274b-37: steng dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin no //

T02TD2905E:274b-42: de ring byang chub sems bskyed nas /

T02TD2905E:274b-44: chos kyi dud ni rjes su bus //

T02TD2905E:274b-48: sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su spyod //

T02TD2905E:275a-0: 'dir de kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rdo @275a * //

T02TD2905E:275a-3: skad lngas brjod par rjes su byin la /
T02TD2905E:275a-4: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir /
T02TD2905E:275a-5: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2905E:275a-6: sems can thams cad kun la lang //

T02TD2905E:275a-14: phyag rgya bcas la slob ma lung bstan par bya ste /

T02TD2905E:275a-28: khyod kyis nges par bsrung bar byos //
T02TD2905E:275a-29: dam tshig ldan na grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2905E:275a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni //

T02TD2905E:275b-8: rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che //

T02TD2905E:275b-28: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD2905E:275b-29: rtag tu bla ma la phul zhing //
T02TD2905E:275b-30: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa yi //
T02TD2905E:275b-32: ji ltar bstan pa'i dam tshig ni //

T02TD2905E:275b-42: slob ma'i lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong slob dpon gyis bzung la /

T02TD2905E:275b-49: thams cad bsres pa'i sbyin sreg dbul zhing //

T02TD2905E:276a-18: su po shyo me bha ba /

T02TD2905E:276a-30: lha mnyes par bya ba'i don ru sbyin sreg gi thab zlum po khru gang pa /

T02TD2905E:277a-0: dge 'dun gyi me yis ni rgyas pa'o @277a * //

T02TD2905E:277a-4: gdol ba'i khyim gyi me yis ni drag pa'i las la'o //

T02TD2905E:277a-7: slong mo pa'i mes ni de bzhin dgug pa'o //

T02TD2905E:277a-16: rtsa ba gtsang ba dri ma med pa //

T02TD2905E:277a-47: drag po'i las khang par ta'i sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:277a-48: me 'bar ba'i mtshan ma brtags la //
T02TD2905E:277a-49: me bskor zhing dgang blugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:277a-50: yang bgegs kyi mtshan ma dang ldan na /
T02TD2905E:277b-0: bskrad cing mar gyi dgang blugs @277b gsum sbyin zhing /
T02TD2905E:277b-1: gzhan yang gcig nas bdun gyi bar gang yang rung bas so //
T02TD2905E:277b-2: de nas mar gyi rjes su til dbul zhing /
T02TD2905E:277b-3: de nas 'bru gzhan rnams kyang rim gyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-4: drag po'i las la ni mi'i rus pa btags pa'i phye ma dang ldan pa'i dbul zhing /
T02TD2905E:277b-5: zho la sgos pa'i rdzas rnams ni zhal du'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-11: mchod yon dang mar me ni mdun du'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-13: yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-14: de nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i rim pas bya ste /
T02TD2905E:277b-16: bhakha tra bho la h'um ho dza /
T02TD2905E:277b-20: dbang du bya ba la dri dang mar me la sogs pa /
T02TD2905E:277b-21: zhi ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis au ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD2905E:277b-22: lce rdo rje'i sbu gu can yi ge h'um gis mtshan pas yang dag par mchod de bsreg rdzas thams cad kyang sngags gsum gsum gyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-23: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dgang blugs bzung la /
T02TD2905E:277b-24: che ge mo zhi ba'i don du zhes bya ba la sogs pa mtha' bsgyur gyi sngags dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-25: de'ang rgyud gzhan gyi cho ga'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-26: de nas yi ge h'um brjod cing /
T02TD2905E:277b-27: de nas dgang blugs la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02TD2905E:277b-28: mchod yon dang dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2905E:277b-30: de nas dngos grub kyi don du me la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2905E:277b-31: yang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la //
T02TD2905E:277b-32: de ltar lan gsum mam bzhi la sogs pas dbul zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-33: ji ltar sems can kun gyi don //
T02TD2905E:277b-34: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsal bar gsungs //
T02TD2905E:277b-35: sbyin sreg la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2905E:277b-36: sngags kyi bzlas pa dag pa rnams //
T02TD2905E:277b-37: ji ltar sems can kun don la //
T02TD2905E:277b-38: ji ltar bris pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2905E:277b-39: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2905E:277b-40: myur du mya ngan 'das mchog shog /
T02TD2905E:277b-41: dpal byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD2905E:277b-43: // / slob dpon chen po blo bzangs skyong gis mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2905E:277b-44: 'di'i sha lo ka'i grangs ni tshig su bcad pa bdun brgya'o //
T02TD2905E:278a-0: rgya gar gyi pandi ta sgra p'a n'i ni @278a * //
T02TD2905E:278a-1: yongs su rdzogs pa'i snyan dngags dang tshig gi sdeb la mkhas pa non ni pandi ta dang /
T02TD2905E:278a-2: bod kyi lo ts'a ba au rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis ri bo chen po sbu tra'i mgul du bsgyur ba'o//
